Seam Carving

Rakin Rouf

About

Seam carving is a content aware image resizing algorithm which aims to preserve high energy portions of the image. Unlike cropping, which linearly removes outer portions of the image, seam carving seeks to remove the lowest energy path. To determine the path with the lowest energy, the image's gradient must be calculated which reveals the energy of each pixel. Afterwards the lowest energy path is calculated through dynamic programming and removed from the image.
